abstract.text: This class represents a scanned documents page.

inlineContent.text: A scanned document page basically consists of an original image, a polygon that describes the location of a
paper document in the image and an image filter. Cropping and perspective-correcting the original image generates
the unfiltered document image. Adding the filter generates the final document image, which is an
optimized digital representation of the scanned paper document.
This class encapsulates image processing, storing, persisting and preview creation in a very efficient way.
You can rotate the image, change the polygon and filter, limit the image size and more in a non-destructive way.
Document and preview images are lazily recreated after performing such changes.
All images are persisted and cached on disk.
At any time you can request either an
or the file URL to any of the images.
